title: "Leaked benchmarks reveal the Nvidia RTX 4080 Super GPU isn't much better than its normal version"
excerpt: "The 4080 Super has a 256-bit bus interface with 16 GB GDDR6X memory boosted to 23 Gbps, the same TGP as the RTX 4080 Non-SUPER at 320W, 52 Shader TFLOPs, 121 RT TFLOPs, and 836 AI TOPs while supporting NV encode technologies like AV1 and H.264."
